attribs.name: damage_resistances
attribs.current: cold, necrotic; non magical weapons that aren't silvered

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KJUlKiEXwLV38umLyVB_saving_throw_failure
attribs.current: Drain Max HP by damage taken

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KJUlKiEXwLV38umLyVB_content
attribs.current:
n. one
creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3} necrotic damage. The target must
succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or its hit point
maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken,
This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The
target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A
humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie
under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life
or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve
zombies under its control at one time.

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KJUmHYHTZJWzBHMbvw9_content
attribs.current:
The wight exhales a biast of frosty
wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a
DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) cold damage on a
failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJUkhQERjl0ZJN2Z4kZ_content
attribs.current: Creatures that touch or attack melee attacks within 5ft

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJUkwTPn2QxNU72B2nC_content
attribs.current: The wight makes two battleaxe attacks, It can use its Life Drain in place of one battle axe attack.
